reviews.review:
This was my go-to game for a long time.

i played it nearly from the start and recently took a break.

If u played this game for years, got all the perks you need and are willing to show absolutely no mercy every game you are going to have a good time, but

if you are just starting to play this game, have nothing unlocked and are not really skilled you are going to have the worst time of your life especially as killer. Tryhards with the best builds and a really toxic behaviour are going to ruin your fun in seconds.

So if you already got dbd: its pretty great.
if you dont got dbd: dont even think about it. its horrible.
Прекрасная игра! после установки моя мать пропала
switch,ps4,pcとやってきた。キーボード操作は慣れるまで時間がかかったけどなんだかんだ言ってもやってて普通に面白い。

This game has a gameplay loop that nearly no other game has done as well, yet. Many of the people who still play the game are very good and, as a newer player, (even 500 hours can be considered new) you will have so many instances where you don't understand what happened for way too many hours of playtime. Will will get stomped on for a...long...time.

I play killer mostly, so I can speak to that more. The goal of a killers game is to get hooks, and survivors have a lot, a lot, of tools to mess with you. To an extent, they should because the killer is stronger. But, it means that a survivor can get a sense of fun gameplay by "styling" on the killer, a surivior isn't always expected to survive anyway. A ruthless killer will get more kills, true, but by playing that way, you know how unfair it is. Not necessarily fun. Playing in a way that is more fair means you can, very easily, not get any kills against harder teams. While you don't need to kill everyone, you won't even get one some games where you are fair. Too many times will you just get teabagged, run in circles for minutes, pallet stunned, or flashlight blinded five times before you down them, where you might only get a super fun game ten percent of the time. You will know that you still have to invest hundreds of hours to even reach a level approaching equal to many.

As a survivor, you are always at the whims of the killer unless you are good enough to crush their spirit. More time investment. So many survivors just give up because the killer decides to be ruthless. There isn't much they can do. There are games where the stars align and you get everything done, one person dies but you barely make it out everyone's excited. The killer might have had a good game too. Ideally, all five players want to have fun, right? Survivors are rolling the dice every match and the time investment to lessen that is too long and once you reach good levels, many survivors will make sure the killer isn't having fun.

If you can play with friends, and laugh at the same time, that's best. Every game is better with friends so i guess that's unnecessary to say.

I haven't felt more frustration in any other game that I've ever played and I expect to come back in the future to play more and attempt to reach a mediocre level of "good." No other game offers this kind of gameplay. Yet. Do I recommend anyone else suffer through this for twice the amount of time I have already played to reach a mediocre level? No way in hell.
Top tier game with high ratings in every category.
im hooked and only had it for two weeks really easy to grind and get good at highly recomend
Game is good fun but watch out for the entitled players that try to control how you play.
很好的游戏，但目前几个版本游戏环境太差，人类速修几分钟一局就结束了，屠夫很难阻止人类速修

Honestly? Pretty fun. Don't take it too seriously. I only play occasionally but love the community (well, the ONLINE community) and consume tons of content about the game.

It has issues but it's a wholly unique experience you don't really get elsewhere.

If you want to see what the game is all about, and have a massive backlog of some great content, check out Otzdarva(/his alt Not Otzdarva), SpookNJukes, Ayrun (/his alt Not Ayrun) on YouTube.

Game itself 7/10, online community 9/10.

ゲーム自体は面白いです。ただクラッシュの頻度が高くプレイにならない時があります。
プレイ中にクラッシュした場合、故意の切断扱いともなり非常に不快になります。
特にキラープレイ中でのクラッシュが多く、折角全滅できそうになってもクラッシュしてモチベが下がる場合があります。
バランスが取れてない問題などもありますが、キラー、サバイバーどちらも楽しいです。
10/10 I hooked somebody and just kept spinning in front of him, still don't know why he died though.
its really good until you wanna die and then itll be really good again in a bout a year or two

I have never played survivor. I only play killer and I talk to my self and mock the survivors mortality while I chase them. I laugh and scream hysterically when I finally make them bleed. This game has unlocked a part of my being I didn't know I had. 10/10 -Psychopath approved.

i play big hillbilly man i get 4k then i play nea i get dead now i play killer again 10/10

+1500 hours on console and whatever I have right now (^here^), has rotten my brain to a point where I can no longer have fun in this game. this is a cry for help, I can't stop playing it, even if I uninstall the game is still there to haunt me in my dreams and then I proceed to wake up realizing that I've been playing for several hours getting camped, tea bagged, tunneled, dead hard into a pallet/window, destroyed all the hexes... I can't help but to keep playing to feed my needs of more Dead by Daylight. DLC after DLC bought to find out that at least 80% of the perks I bought are useless. Several years of updates and BHVR can't get their game balanced. Please free me from the shackles of this game before I go insane (if I hasn't go insane by now).



And keep nerfing The Spirit ffs.

update: This is just satire, I'm completely fine.

Dieses Spiel ist zwar gut,aber leider durch die Bugs und laggs unspielbar. Ich alleine hab gefühlt schon tausend gefunden, von rubber banking, bis zum einfrieren habe ich alle schon einmal erlebt oder von raus fliegen einer Runde wo ich dann noch spielersperre enthalten habe und das schlimmste bei jeden Update werden die bugs noch schlimmer und unerträglicher für mich ich hab den spiel jetzt bereits 15 chance gegeben und werde am ende immer wieder enttäuscht. Ich hasse es das es immer wieder dazu kommen muss das ich dieses game mit Frustration beende, und bereue jeden einzelnen Cent den ich in dieses Spiel gesteckt habe und wünsche mir so sehr das ich dieses game nie gekauft hätte.

Between devs who are out of touch, matchmaking penalities for crashing and losing connection from their shitty servers, toxic playerbase, and overpriced cosmetics, this game fucking sucks. Don't buy it.
If i could rate thinking about playing dbd it would be a thumbs up but actually playing is like putting a toothpick under each of your toenails and then kicking a wall as hard as you possibly can
Great Game but a shame I cannot hunt my friends ;(

the game sucks. it was fun for a while but they decided that survivors should get like 40 pallets in per map. if you want to play survivor youll have fun but killer youll spend 90 percent of the game stunned and blinded.
è um jogo legal. o Ruim é só balanceamento.
Best game to play to ruin your day. Was a good game 7 updates ago
fun to play alone or with friends

Es sumamente divertido si te gustan los juego con temática de sobrevivencia, trabajo en equipo y terror. La variedad de personajes es amplia y en ocasiones da la sensación de ser el Smash de los videojuegos de terror. Muchas de las habilidades se prestan a hacer combinaciones interesantes y modificar tu estilo de juego dependiendo de lo que quieras hacer en la partida. Los mapas son interesantes y dinámicos para enfrentar al asesino, sin embargo, es importante destacar que para sacarles el mayor provecho necesitaras desarrollar experiencia conforme vas jugando.

En cuanto a lo negativo destacaría lo siguiente:
-La base jugabilistica de los sobrevivientes es la misma (esto teniendo en cuenta que no usas ningún tipo de habilidad). No importa si juegas con Leon, Nancy, David o Heather, lo único que cambia es la skin y eso hace que sólo busques desbloquear sus habilidades para tenerlas todas en el personaje que más te agrade.
-Es frecuente encontrar camperos (en especial en niveles bajos e intermedios): Si no llevas mucho tiempo jugando y tu equipo no se coordina adecuadamente, date por muerto si alguien te campea, ya que en este juego dependes mucho de tu equipo, y es frecuente que los asesinos que son pésimos jugando recurran al campeo, y se da mucho con personajes como Leatherface, Hillbilly o Myers.

Resumen:
Es un buen juego que no llega al estatus de perfecto, se disfruta mucho jugando con amigos, tiene sus desperfectos pero en general yo lo puedo recomendar.

Ursprünglich gut durchdacht und lustig, jedoch mittlerweile absolut schlecht und einseitig. Das Matchmaking und Rank System wurde von den Entwicklern verändert weshalb sie nun "Noobiges" Gameplay (Tunneln/Campen) der Killer fördern und Survivor härter für eine Niederlage bestrafen selbst wenn sie gut gespielt haben und das nimmt dem survivor den kompletten Spaß am Spiel. Off Meta gameplay ist schon seit dem Release von "Pinhead" nicht mehr wirklich möglich. Killer werden mittlerweile so designed, dass sie nicht mehr das eigentliche Spiel spielen müssen. Die Meta kennt so gut wie keine Balance und Variation. In jeder Runde Spielt jeder das gleiche weil es aufgrund des Matchmakings nicht mehr möglich ist etwas anderes zu spielen ohne dabei gnadenlos in den Boden gestampft werden. Die Zensur des Chats ist sehr fragwürdig und zusätzlich ist die Community Toxic (das ist mittlerweile was normal geworden in Online Games). Alles in Allem ist es ein gutes Game gewesen dem man langsam, aber sicher beim Absturz zusehen konnte. Trotz stetiger sinkender Spielerzahl verändern auch die Entwickler nichts an dem Game
